courseRequest.title: Request a new course
courseRequest.description: Fill out the basic course information. We will notify you once an administrator processes your request.

form.title: Course title
form.reasonPlaceholder: Why do you need this course?
form.dateError: The start date must be before the end date.

courseRequest.success: Your course request was submitted successfully. We'll be in touch soon.
courseRequest.error: The course request could not be submitted.

admin.title: Course requests
admin.subtitle: Review course requests submitted by users and create the course with one click.
admin.acceptSuccess: Course request "{{ title }}" accepted. Course {{ shortName }} created.
